biotools.summary: Statistical framework based on a hierarchical modeling that takes into account shared peptide information for estimating protein abundances. It performs a simultaneous analysis of all the quantified peptides, handling the biological and technical errors as well as the peptide effect.

bioschemas.name: ALL-P

It performs a simultaneous analysis of all the quantified peptides, handling the biological and technical errors as well as the peptide effect.
